description.text: At 20th level, the shared challenge ability increases in power, granting the aide-de-camp full benefit of the esquire's challenge. In addition, if the esquire and aide-de-camp both confirm a critical hit against the same target within the same round, the target must make a Fortitude save (DC 10 +1/2 the esquire's cavalier level + the esquire's Charisma bonus) or be staggered for 1d4 rounds.
